description:
Debug Network Faster & Smarter with Proxyman

Proxyman is a high-performance Windows app, which enables developers to capture, inspect, and manipulate HTTP/HTTPS requests/responses with ease.
‚ú® Features
- Option to show/hide or filter some Warning/Error/Users/System logs from Scripting Console

‚ö°Ô∏è Improve
- Update ElectronJS Core and fix vulnerabilities from dependencies
- Removed Unused Dependencies
- Update Sentry 5
- Improve wording in 'Edit & Repeat' UI
- Lock some features for the FREE app version
- Use ISO 8061 for Full date
- Leading text truncation option for the main table view. Easier to see long text

üêû Bugs
- Fixed: Can not resize the vertical / horizontal Sidebar
- Fixed: Incomplete Display of Hexadecimal Request Bodies and Lack of JSON
- Fixed: Timeout when parsing the URL with invalid chars in the Breakpoint
